title: Vending shrine

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Vending shrine was a feature of the Last Man Standing minigame. At the shrine, players can trade in their items for survival tokens, and use those tokens to purchase equipment of their choice.

content:
Vending shrine was removed after an update.
As the contents of this page no longer exist in Old School RuneScape, this article is preserved for historical purposes.
Vending shrine
Released4 August 2016 (Update)
Removal29 August 2019 (Update)
MembersNo
QuestNo
LocationLast Man Standing
ExamineThe mysterious shrine can trade tokens for items.
Advanced data
Object IDhist29091

The Vending shrine was a feature of the Last Man Standing minigame. At the shrine, players can trade in their items for survival tokens, and use those tokens to purchase equipment of their choice.
